[00:00.00]Humility (Explicit) - Gorillaz (街头霸王)/George Benson (乔治.班森)
[00:06.19]Lyricist：Remi Kabaka/James Ford/George Benson/Damon Albarn
[00:12.39]Composer：Remi Kabaka/James Ford/George Benson/Damon Albarn
[00:18.59]Calling the world from isolation
[00:21.23]
[00:23.56]'Cause right now that's the ball where we're betrayed
[00:26.95]
[00:30.60]And if you're coming back to find me
[00:33.35]
[00:35.81]You'd better have good aim
[00:37.48]
[00:43.21]Shoot it true
[00:45.03]
[00:45.97]I need you in the picture that's why I'm calling you
[00:50.98]
[00:53.90]I'm alone between the left hand
[00:57.39]
[00:59.43]Reset myself and get back on track
[01:02.26]
[01:06.72]I don't want this isolation
[01:09.29]
[01:11.56]See the state I'm in now
[01:13.85]
[01:18.50]Caught in the hard to win the raffle
[01:21.36]
[01:23.43]'Cause right now that's the ball where we be chained
[01:26.94]
[01:31.15]Shoot it true
[01:32.97]
[01:34.05]I want you in the picture that's why I'm calling you
[01:38.73]
[01:42.63]I'm alone between the left hand
[01:45.27]
[01:47.46]Reset myself and get back on track
[01:50.14]
[01:54.67]I don't want this isolation
[01:57.22]
[01:59.43]See the state I'm in now
[02:01.71]
[02:07.62]If I pick it up when I know that it's broken
[02:12.75]
[02:13.55]Do I put it back
[02:15.31]
[02:19.53]Or do I head out on to the lonesome track and let you go
[02:25.52]
[02:30.95]I'm alone between the left hand
[02:33.24]
[02:42.72]I don't want this isolation
[02:45.27]
[02:47.32]See the state I'm in now
[02:49.73]
[02:55.62]If I pick it up when I know that it's broken
[03:00.79]
[03:01.56]Do I put it back
[03:03.62]
[03:07.52]Or do I head out on to the lonesome track and let you go
data.trans:
[ti:Humility]
[ar:Gorillaz/George Benson]
[al:Humility]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:06.19]//
[00:12.39]//
[00:18.59]在孤立之中唤醒全世界
[00:21.23]
[00:23.56]只因此时此刻 我们已然背弃这颗星球
[00:26.95]
[00:30.60]若是你能回心转意 来寻找我
[00:33.35]
[00:35.81]你最好目标清晰
[00:37.48]
[00:43.21]按下快门 定格这一刻
[00:45.03]
[00:45.97]我需要你出现在画面中 这就是我为何唤你前来
[00:50.98]
[00:53.90]我伸手左手 却迟迟得不到回应 倍感孤单
[00:57.39]
[00:59.43]重装待发 重新步入正轨
[01:02.26]
[01:06.72]我不愿众叛亲离 倍受孤立
[01:09.29]
[01:11.56]看到如今我的处境了吗
[01:13.85]
[01:18.50]深陷博弈之中 步履维艰 胜算毫无把握 
[01:21.36]
[01:23.43]只因此时此刻 我们牢牢束缚在这颗星球
[01:26.94]
[01:31.15]按下快门 定格这一刻
[01:32.97]
[01:34.05]我需要你出现在画面中 这就是我为何唤你前来
[01:38.73]
[01:42.63]我伸手左手 却迟迟得不到回应 倍感孤单
[01:45.27]
[01:47.46]重装待发 重新步入正轨
[01:50.14]
[01:54.67]我不愿众叛亲离 倍受孤立
[01:57.22]
[01:59.43]看到如今我的处境了吗
[02:01.71]
[02:07.62]当我知晓一切破碎不堪时 若是我将其拼凑
[02:12.75]
[02:13.55]是否一切能重回原样
[02:15.31]
[02:19.53]亦或我应该继续孤独的走下去 任由你离我而去
[02:25.52]
[02:30.95]我伸手左手 却迟迟得不到回应 倍感孤单
[02:33.24]
[02:42.72]我不愿众叛亲离 倍受孤立
[02:45.27]
[02:47.32]看到如今我的处境了吗
[02:49.73]
[02:55.62]当我知晓一切破碎不堪时 若是我将其拼凑
[03:00.79]
[03:01.56]是否一切能重回原样
[03:03.62]
[03:07.52]亦或我应该继续孤独的走下去 任由你离我而去
